category.name: Configuration.Search
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: QRY_latest_ItemRevision_limit
preference.preference_description: Controls the maximum number of objects that can be loaded for Revision check to retrieve the latest Item Revision of the search results. The default value is 3000. If defined too large, more memory is required to load all objects and process the Revision check.
